amendment.description: Amendment sought to transfer $100 million in funding from weapons systems accounts to the Army Corps of Engineers for flood control projects.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 28 printed in the Congressional Record to revise funding levels by reducing the amount made available for "Atomic Energy Defense Activities--National Nuclear Security Administration--Weapons Activities", and increasing the amount made available by "Corps of Engineers-Civil--Construction", by $100 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 253 (Roll no. 341).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A060) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 253 (Roll no. 341).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A060) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
